verse.name: v1
verse.lines: “No condemnation!” precious word! Consider it, my soul! Thy sins were all on Jesus laid, His stripes have made thee whole.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In God’s own presence now for us The Savior doth appear; The saints, as jewels on His heart, Jesus doth ever bear.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: “No condemnation!” O my soul, ’Tis God that speaks the word; Perfect in comeliness art thou In Christ, the risen Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Teach me, O God, to fix mine eyes On Christ, the spotless Lamb, So shall I love Thy precious will, And glorify His name.
